Another structure is described on the following pages:\\n\\n"}', '{"color":"dark_purple","text":"You may have already found some new interesting items and tools laying in chests all around your world..\\nWait you haven\'t?\\nThen go and search for them!\\n\\nIf you already think these items are uncraftable, don\'t worry this is where"}', '{"color":"dark_purple","text":"the Disassambling Table comes into place. You can use it to take tools apart and learn which materials had been used for the original forming.\\n\\nThe Blueprint is shown on the following pages."}',
